trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto

divs: Sighting DetailsAt 8:20pm my dog barked at my back door. I was right there so stepped out to see why. Nothing in the yard, I looked up and saw a very bright starlike object travelling from nnw to sse high in sky. It was about twice as bright as Venus, and on a true course. I watchedit untill it went behind some trees. Silent, and steady brightness.
